eventsData.title: Pariveda Solutions Talk & Dinner
eventsData.description: Rethink Technology Consulting: This will be a dinner and talk to learn more about software development work at Pariveda Solutions and what your future could look like with the company.

eventsData.title: NY Capital Hackathon for Inclusivity
eventsData.location: RPI Campus - More Details To Come
eventsData.description: Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute’s inaugural women in tech summit, NYχ, will take place April 16 - 17th starting at 9:00am. We hope this event will bring together women in CS throughout the Capital District Region while also engaging them intellectually with the conference and a hackathon. You don’t need to be veteran hacker to participate! Any woman interested in programming, hackathons, or networking is highly encouraged to attend.

eventsData.title: ACMW Distinguished Speaker Series: Morgan McKenney
eventsData.description: Morgan McKenney is the global business head for cross-currency payments at Citi ensuring corporate, financial institutions and public sector clients are able to make payments globally. Prior to this position she was the Chief Operating Officer of Global Treasury and Trade Solutions at Citi. Morgan will be highlighting her path to success as a woman in a technical field and sharing with us the potential future of digital currency.  We will be providing food and drinks. Once we have the location set, we will update the event information!

eventsData.title: General Business Meeting
eventsData.description: This meeting is open to everyone, so if you don’t know what ACM-W is, you can come to the meeting to find out who we are and what we do.  This week, we will be discussing our plans for the diversity hackathon that we are hosting in April.  If you’re interested in volunteering to help at the hackathon, please come to this meeting to get more information on how you can help out!

eventsData.title: Google & ACMW Interview Prep Roundtable
eventsData.description: Curious what types of questions are asked in the Google technical interview? Interested in brushing up on your interview skills? Join Google engineers to receive tips, and feel free to bring your questions!
